<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Protective Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=534)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 407 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot-radius emanation centered on you

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You emanate a shimmering aura of protective magic. You and any allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Each time you Sustain the Spell, the emanation's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 30 feet.
name: Protective Ward
